duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative guidance on the architecture and design of privacy controls, mechanisms, and protocols across the organization and product lines.
Guide engineering teams to ensure transparent data collection and usage practices that protect user privacy and mitigate risk.
Design and implement privacy capabilities, patterns, and policies to be integrated into products and provide technical consulting on privacy for product teams.
Use 3rd party commercial tooling for privacy reviews and tracking issues, and analyze and audit data through its lifecycle to ensure privacy requirements are met.
Build relationships with technical and compliance teams to deliver privacy-by-design controls incorporated into engineering deployments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a similar technical field (Master's degree preferred)
Certifications related to privacy, such as CIPP, CIPT, or CIPM
